name: Judith Johnson
text: Lobster sandwich was awesome !  But we were the only people in the place. We got an order to go and they didn't get the order right.  We didn't find out until we stopped to eat our lunch, and it was too late to go back.

name: kopka vincent
text: Diangelo is by far my favorite place to get a grilled sandwich. Every time I go , I leave with a smile!!! The staff is super friendly and the food is to die for!!! I usually go with the classic steak and cheese, the steak is fresh and â€¦More

text: I order salads from here with my coworkers FAITHFULLY. One time I got a salad from here and took two bites and spit out the second bite. There was some type of cleaning product in my salad!! I called back and was informed it could have been â€¦More

name: Ash Brown
text: I was in there at 1030 this morning to get my lunch. Im just getting a chance to eat my sandwich now at 430pm. I asked for a steak and cheese with extra cheese and pickles. I got no extra cheese and no pickles total waste of money. Not happy

name: Electro Funk
text: Lousy customer service. Always a problem ordering.  Did not get my 5 dollar off rewards and the girl who messed it up tried to cover it up til I called the manager over. Smithfield location is much better and will never take a chance on the aggravation again in the Johnston location.
